name: Deskley: The Friendly Helper Robot!
description:
One day you decide to go work on your school paper you were going to start a week ago. However, you notice that 8 of your most useful keys of your keyboard are missing. You must find these keys to finish your paper!

Take the role of Deskley, a toy robot that is designed to help you find missing objects around your desk! Traverse across a massive, lifelike desk environment as you explore and search for the keys that will help you finish your paper. Solve mind-bending puzzles and experience riveting challenges as you search for these missing keys to your keyboard!

Supports controller/keyboard (controller recommended)

WASD/Analog Stick - Move

South Button - Jump

L2/R2 - Ground Pound

By:

Matthew Dadoun

Jacob Pratley 

Katie Tong

Special Thanks:
